summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6177 for the improvement of The Alley in Blocks 21, 24 and 25, Wood's South Division of Green Lake Addition, being the alley between Keystone Place and Kirkwood Place from North 52nd Street to North 54th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87035, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
